reviews.text: It's basically a garden in the middle of  3 office towers. It's quite lush, with some infinity water fountains with a relaxing water sound. We visited on labor day, so it was totally empty, almost covid empty....just the grumpy guard that mentioned that videos with action cams are not allowed.

Green Heart in Singapore is a hidden gem that offers a peaceful escape amidst the bustling city. Nestled within the CBD, this lush urban sanctuary is beautifully landscaped with vibrant greenery and tranquil water features.

It’s the perfect spot for a quick break, a relaxing stroll, or even some quiet reflection. The well-maintained paths and shaded seating areas make it ideal for visitors to unwind. The integration of nature into the modern surroundings is truly impressive and showcases Singapore’s commitment to sustainability.

Highly recommended for anyone seeking a slice of nature in the city!

Green Heart Marina One is a serene oasis nestled amidst the bustling cityscape. Its impeccable design seamlessly integrates lush greenery with modern architecture, creating an environment that fosters tranquility and well-being. The marina offers a breathtaking view of the waterfront, perfect for leisurely strolls or enjoying a sunset sail. The facilities are top-notch, with well-maintained docks and amenities catering to both seasoned sailors and novice boaters. The on-site restaurants serve delectable cuisine, complemented by attentive service and picturesque surroundings. Whether you're seeking a peaceful retreat or an active lifestyle on the water, Green Heart Marina One exceeds expectations with its blend of natural beauty and urban sophistication. With its commitment to sustainability and community engagement, it sets a new standard for waterfront living.
This building complex has so much architectural value. Great for students and for leisure. Few restaurants are open on Sundays. Loved the garden space and organisation.
Beautiful place, I definitely can recommend it  if you have some time
